places.name: Bellevue Downtown Park
places.description: Lushly planted city park featuring a 240-foot-wide waterfall, a picnic green & a playground. Perfect for family outings with wide open spaces, peaceful walking paths, and the famous Inspiration Playground designed for all abilities.
places.parkingInfo: Free parking available in multiple lots including Southern Parking Lot
places.bestTimeToVisit: Weekday mornings or late afternoons (less crowded)
places.foodOptions: Picnic areas available, bring your own food. Nearby restaurants in downtown Bellevue
places.specialNotes: Features the famous 240-foot waterfall, duck pond, and the Inspiration Playground. Dog-friendly with designated areas. Great for jogging, walking, or family picnics. Open 24 hours.

yunsolExperience.likes: The waterfall is mesmerizing for Yunsol! She could watch the ducks for hours and loves the Inspiration Playground.
yunsolExperience.dislikes: The walking paths can be long for little legs. Some areas get muddy after rain.
yunsolExperience.personalNotes: The duck pond is magical in the morning. Bring breadcrumbs (if allowed) and a stroller for the longer walks. The playground is perfect for her age group - safe but challenging!

tips.title: Pack Smart
tips.description: Always bring snacks, water, extra clothes, and favorite comfort items. A well-packed bag can save the day!

tips.title: Time It Right
tips.description: Plan outings around nap times and meal schedules. Happy, well-rested toddlers make for better adventures!

tips.title: Safety First
tips.description: Research the venue beforehand, check for toddler-proofing, and always keep a close eye on your little explorer.

tips.title: Have a Backup Plan
tips.description: Weather changes, meltdowns happen! Always have an indoor alternative or know when it's time to head home.
